ISSUE.TITLE: Error deploying app if an included form contains a dropdown (6.3.0)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hello again, We are having an issue with the latest release (6.3.0), Using the modeler app we added dropdown field to test the new expression feature, and then when trying to publish a new version of the app we get the follolwing error > Invalid deploy result code: HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11189145/38356682-0b90754e-38c9-11e8-8263-f96b9fd9e01a.png) W tried with static options for the dropdown and the problem persisted. we removed the dropdown field and the app was published successfully. Any idea what's going wrong?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #953 from alagane/fix-bug-draw-diagram Fix diagrams with unknown elements aren't drawn

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Properties migrator should be compile dependency The property migrator should not be a runtime dependency as it is required for the migration path to the new Spring Boot properties of the apps Fixes #957
